ChangeList.Description: Added the **userAccountType** property to the [cloudPC](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/cloudPC?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the **osVersion** property to the [cloudPC](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/cloudPC?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
Added the `dnsCheckNameWithInvalidCharacter` member to the **cloudPcOnPremisesConnectionHealthCheckErrorType** enumeration.
Added the `azureAdDeviceSyncCheckScpNotConfigured` member to the **cloudPcOnPremisesConnectionHealthCheckErrorType** enumeration.
Added the `pendingProvision` member to the **cloudPcStatus** enumeration.
Added the **userAccountType** parameter to the [reprovision](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/cloudPC-reprovision?view=graph-rest-beta) method.
Added the **osVersion** parameter to the [reprovision](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/cloudPC-reprovision?view=graph-rest-beta) method.

Added the [changeUserAccountType](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/cloudPC-changeUserAccountType?view=graph-rest-beta) method to the [cloudPC](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/resources/cloudPC?view=graph-rest-beta) resource.
